sage.scene.bounding

Class BoundingVolume

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.bounding.BoundingVolume
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundingBox, BoundingSphere

    public abstract class BoundingVolume
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    BoundingVolume is an abstract base class for deriving implementations of bounding volumes. Every subclass should assign to its instances a type which is an element of BoundingVolume.BVType.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BoundingVolume.BVType
      Defines the supported Bounding Volume types.

      • computeFromPoints

        public abstract BoundingVolume computeFromPoints(java.nio.FloatBuffer vertices)
        Updates this BoundingVolume by computing a new defintion of the BoundingVolume's data based on the specified set of vertices.
        Parameters:
        vertices - - the vertices which the new definition of this BoundingVolume is to contain
        Returns:
        the new BoundingVolume containing the specified vertices

      • contains

        public abstract boolean contains(graphicslib3D.Point3D p)
        Returns true if this BoundingVolume contains the specified point; false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        p - - the point to test against this BoundingVolume
        Returns:
        true if the specified point is contained in this BoundingVolume

      • intersects

        public abstract boolean intersects(BoundingVolume otherBV)
        Returns true if this BoundingVolume intersects the specified BoundingVolume; false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        otherBV - - the BoundingVolume to check for intersection with this BoundingVolume
        Returns:
        true if this BV intersects the specified BV

      • transformBy

        public abstract BoundingVolume transformBy(graphicslib3D.Matrix3D mat,
                                           double[] scaleValues)
        Transforms the center of this BoundingVolume by the specified Matrix3D transformation. Scales the size of the bounding volume using the values stored in the scaleValues parameter.
        Parameters:
        mat - - the transformation to apply to the center of this BoundingVolume
        scaleValues - - an array of doubles holding the x, y, and z scale values of the matrix transforming this bounding volume.
        Returns:
        - the resulting (transformed) BV

      • isOnNegativeSide

        public abstract boolean isOnNegativeSide(Plane p)
        Returns true if this BoundingVolume lies entirely on the negative side of the specified Plane; false if at least some portion of this BoundingVolume touches or lies on the positive side of the specified Plane.
        Parameters:
        p - - the Plane against which to test this BoundingVolume
        Returns:
        true if this BV lies entirely on the negative side of the plane

      • merge

        public abstract BoundingVolume merge(BoundingVolume otherBV)
        Returns a new BoundingVolume which is the merge of this BoundingVolume and the specified BoundingVolume. The merge of two BoundingVolumes is defined as a BoundingVolume which completely contains those two BoundingVolumes.

        Note that this method does not alter this BoundingVolume; applications that wish to replace a BoundingVolume with its merge with another BoundingVolume should assign the returned BoundingVolume to the initial BoundingVolume.

        Parameters:
        otherBV - - the BoundingVolume used to compute a merge with this BoundingVolume
        Returns:
        a new BoundingVolume which contains both this BoundingVolume and the specified BoundingVolume

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Returns a clone of this BoundingVolume. The returned object is obtained by calling super.clone(); no additional data is copied into the cloned object.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a clone of this BoundingVolume
